meanings.sent1: The jargonistic manual was difficult to understand for beginners.
meanings.sent2: The article was full of jargonistic terms that only experts could decipher.
meanings.sent3: The jargonistic conversation between the scientists left the students utterly confused.
meanings.sent4: Her jargonistic explanation of the topic flew over my head.
meanings.sent5: The jargonistic language used in the report made it hard to follow.

meanings.definition: Characterized by technical language or specialized terminology
meanings.sent1: The jargonistic presentation was filled with complex terms.
meanings.sent2: The manual was jargonistic, making it challenging for non-experts to comprehend.
meanings.sent3: His jargonistic speech at the conference made everyone yawn.
meanings.sent4: The jargonistic nature of the document made it seem like a foreign language.
meanings.sent5: The jargonistic nature of the subject made it hard for beginners to grasp.
